title: Skip Waiting For Stats
body:
I'd say more than half of my games end up with me sitting, looking at a button that says "skip waiting for stats" perpetually. 

The end screens never load, so I don't get a chance to honour or report, and it has even occasionally not given me a ranking or IP. 

This is not a new issue, but I was hoping it might resolve itself with the new honour system loading in. However, it's still a prevalent as ever. 
Anyone else experience this? Any ideas what could be causing it?

Thanks!

replies.body: Are you able to see the client whatsoever after the game itself closes out? If not, check out your client options and look for one called "close client during game" and make sure that is **not** turned on.
